whowrotethat-ext-name: jan seme li sitelen e ni?
whowrotethat-ext-name-beta: jan seme li sitelen e ni? (ilo namako)
whowrotethat-ext-desc: o sona e ante lon lipu kepeken nasin lukin. ilo ni li kama sona tan ilo WikiWho.
whowrotethat-ext-desc-beta: o sona e ante lipu. ilo li kama sona tan ilo WikiWho. ni li nasin namako, li ken pakala.

whowrotethat-activation-link-tooltip: o kama e ilo "jan seme li sitelen e ni?"
whowrotethat-deactivation-link: o weka e ilo "jan seme li sitelen e ni?"
whowrotethat-state-pending: ilo '$1' li kama. ni li ken wile e tenpo suli.
whowrotethat-state-pending-name: jan seme li sitelen e ni?
whowrotethat-error-contact-link: pakala li awen la, o toki tawa mi.
